item.description:
Good news Everyone!

The book for this month is World War Z by Max Brooks. After a poll featuring three books, this is the one that you guys picked! The story is told in an interview format where the narrator asks people about their experience when the dead started rising from the grave.

We will be meeting at  Rodney's Bookstore on Mass Ave. There is parking around the corner on Green St. ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there!  
-Josh
item.how_to_find_us: We are up the stairs! Hopefully in comfy chairs. But not sitting in pairs, that would be weird...
item.name: October Book Club Meeting
